Package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.chain

Class FluentService

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.chain.FluentService
All Implemented Interfaces:
FluentChain
Direct Known Subclasses:
FluentServiceDecorator
public class FluentService extends Object implements FluentChain
Provides a base implementation for fluent service interactions.

This class serves as a foundation for fluent service execution, offering retry mechanisms, validation handling, and structured test execution flow.

Author:

    • retryUntil

      protected <T> FluentService retryUntil(RetryCondition<T> retryCondition, Duration maxWait, Duration retryInterval, Object service)
      Executes a retry mechanism until a specified condition is met.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type used in the retry condition function.
      Parameters:
      retryCondition - The retry condition to be checked.
      maxWait - The maximum duration to wait before giving up.
      retryInterval - The interval between retries.
      service - The service instance used in the retry condition.
      Returns:
      The current FluentService instance for method chaining.

    • setQuest

      protected void setQuest(SuperQuest quest)
      Assigns a SuperQuest instance to this service.
      Parameters:
      quest - The SuperQuest instance to be assigned.

    • validation

      protected void validation(List<io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core.AssertionResult<Object>> assertionResults)
      Performs validation on a list of assertion results.

      This method logs, reports, and evaluates assertions, supporting both soft and hard validations.

      Parameters:
      assertionResults - The list of assertion results to be validated.

    • postQuestSetupInitialization

      protected void postQuestSetupInitialization()
      Hook method for initializing any required setup after a quest is configured.

      This method can be overridden by subclasses to provide custom setup logic.
